This is a holdover from Heritrix 1 (where constructor arguments were requir=
ed) that has since been fixed in 3.1.2-SNAPSHOT.

This string has no effect=
. Just supply any string argument to the constructor to make it work with v=
ersions 3.1.1 and under.

E.g.

<bean name=3D"notMatchesRegexFilter" class=
=3D"org.archive.modules.deciderules.NotMatchesRegexDecideRule">
<constructo=
r-arg index=3D"0" type=3D"java.lang.String" value=3D"Anything"/>
...


- Kr=
